thread.title: Pope baptises Italy "migrant hero" at Easter eve service

title: Pope baptises Italy "migrant hero" at Easter eve service
text:
Pope baptises Italy "migrant hero" at Easter eve service 4:36pm BST - 00:46 
During an Easter Procession on Saturday, Pope Francis baptised a Nigerian man who foiled a roberry at a supermarket in Rome. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
